div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 08:35 am CDT

div.span: Showers likely, mainly between 10am and 2pm. Cloudy, with a high near 61. North wind 8 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
A 10 percent chance of showers before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around 41. North wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 68. Northwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

div.p:
You are cordially invited to attend the surprise induction ceremony to be held via zoom on Monday, May 4 at 7:00 p.m.Â As with the past, the students do not know who will be inducted until they are announced at the ceremony.Â Please join us to be part of the surpriseÂ and support our new National Honor Society inductees.Â Â
Â
Please attend the zoom meeting via the link below on Monday, May 4, . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about 2020 National Honor Society Induction Ceremony

h3.a: Request for recruiting election poll workers for the upcoming Jefferson County Primary Election on May 12th.

div.p:
Request for recruiting election poll workers for the upcoming Jefferson County Primary Election on May 12 th .Â
Â
If they are at least 18, there are no restrictions.Â
Â
Qualifications for workers: Must be a registered voter in Jefferson County, able to read and write . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Request for recruiting election poll workers for the upcoming Jefferson County Primary Election on May 12th.

div.p:
As students have worked away in this unusual and difficult time we have created a system that will reward students and their work during this unprecedented fourth quarter.Â Â
In an effort to encourage students to proceed with instruction and completion of class work the following is a rubric that will be used to add to a studentâs 3rd quarter grade

h3.a: COVID-19 Pandemic UPDATE as of April 10, 2020

div.p:
Meridian Public Schools is sharing the following information concerning the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
COVID -19 Pandemic UPDATE as of April 10, 2020
Â
Elementary
Student belongings will be sent home on a weekly schedule.Â Â
April 14 will be 3rd grade
April 20 will be PK & K
April 27 will be 1st
May 4 will be 2nd
May 11 will be 4th . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about COVID-19 Pandemic UPDATE as of April 10, 2020
